code: import{Card,CardContent,CardMedia,CardActionArea,CardActions}from'@mui/material';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import classes from'./BlogCard.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var clipTitle=function clipTitle(title){var titleLength=40;if(title.length<titleLength)return title+Array(titleLength-title.length).fill('\xa0').join('');else if(title.length>titleLength)return title.substring(0,titleLength-3)+'...';else return title;};var BlogCard=function BlogCard(props){var title=props.title,content=props.content,link=props.link,tags=props.tags,handleClick=props.handleClick,image=props.image;var blogTitle=clipTitle(title);var cardClickHandler=function cardClickHandler(){var newWindow=window.open(link,'_blank','noopener,noreferrer');if(newWindow)newWindow.opener=null;};var shareHandler=function shareHandler(){handleClick(link);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardActionArea,{onClick:cardClickHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"200px",image:image,alt:"medium-url"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{height:'220px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:classes.cardTitle,children:blogTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:classes.cardContent,children:content})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'16px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:classes.tags,children:["#",tags[0]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:classes.tags,children:["#",tags[1]]})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardActions,{sx:{px:2,pb:2},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"button",to:"#",onClick:shareHandler,children:"Share"})})]});};export default BlogCard;
